name: Randy The Plumbing Rabbit Vs The Angry Aliens
name_original: Randy The Plumbing Rabbit Vs The Angry Aliens
description:
An angry hoard of aliens and their spike-covered drones have invaded Flushleaf Forest; angering the locals, stealing their supplies, and hypnotizing the native Knuts. As Randy, it's up to you to take back the loot and kick some boot-y!

  • Leap though 16 challenging levels defeating aliens and collecting crates!
  • Make your way though Aliens, Knuts, and Spikemobiles!
  • Get a 1-up after collecting 10 crates!

This is my first time using NESMaker. It took about five months to make the game, with the final product being fairly decent.

If you want to make NES games yourself, you can download NESMaker here: https://www.thenew8bitheroes.com/
